manifest.author: Evan Bonsignori
manifest.name: @ Symbol Linking
manifest.description: Adds ability to link with @ (the At Symbol) in Obsidian. Can limit @ linking to specific folders e.g. People/

manifest.name: Interlinear Glossing
manifest.description: Format interlinear glosses used in linguistics texts.

manifest.name: QuickLink

manifest.author: XmoncocoX
manifest.name: my anime list text exporter

manifest.name: Typing speed
manifest.description: This is a plugin for showing the current typing speed in the status bar

manifest.author: Ferenc Moricz
manifest.name: Tokenz
manifest.description: Insert shortcodes into your document, e.g smileys :) or emojis :wink: . User-defined short code maps are also supported.

manifest.author: slow-groovin
manifest.name: Simple Disguise
manifest.description: Disguise/obscure/hide the content in a very simple way.

manifest.name: Multi-Column Markdown

manifest.author: markusmo3

manifest.description: This is a plugin to make obsidian markdown syntax compatible with other markdown syntax.

manifest.author: Blue Heron
manifest.name: Efficient Word Count

manifest.author: Jeremy Valentine
manifest.name: Dice Roller
manifest.description: Inline dice rolling for Obsidian.md

manifest.name: Canvas LMS Task Importer
manifest.description: Import tasks from Canvas LMS into vault.
